availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

body.p:
JOSEPH B. NONES,
NOTARY PUBLIC OF THE STATE OF NEW-YORK, AND COMMISSIONER OF

New-York,
Maryland,
North Carolina,
South Carolina.
Georgia,
Texas,
Iowa,
Arkansas,
Colarado,
Pennsylvania,
Illinois,
Ohio,
Kentucky,
Alabama,
Mississippi,
Oregon,
Washington,
Arizona,
Virginia,
Tennessee,
Florida,
Louisiana,
Indiana,
Missouri,
Nebraska,
Kansas,
Nevada,
California,
Wisconsin,
Michigan,
Utah,
Minnesota,
New Mexico,
New Jersey,
West Virginia.
Massachusetts,
New Hampshire
Rhode Island,
Connecticut,
Vermont,
Maine,
Delaware,
Dacotah

Ex-officio UNITED STATES COMMISSIONER.
U. S. Passports and Protections issued through J. B. NONES.

N. B. -- Powers of attorney, Deeds, Wills, Bonds and Mortgages, and all other writings, legally and neatly drawn and authenticated. Bounty Lands, Pensions, and Extra Pay for Navy and Army, procured by J. B. N.

OFFICE, No. 262 BROADWAY, Cor. WARREN STREET,
RESIDENCE, No. 76 SEVENTH STREET, (between 1st and 2nd Avenues.)
